Notewise Cloud will DELETE YOUR LOCAL COPIES once your subscription expires. Doesn't matter if they were saved locally on your device, Notewise will go ahead and delete everything. Notewise cannot be trusted with your data.
replyContent: Dear user, as stated in our policy:https://help.notewise.dev/en/support/solutions/articles/150000151167-what-happens-when-notewise-cloud-subscription-expires-, if you do not re-subscribe by the end of the 14-day grace period, your cloud-stored notes will be permanently deleted. Feel free to contact us if you have other questions. Thank you.

replyContent: Hey Rick, sorry Fieldy's been frustrating! The "connected to another phone" error was a known issue and has been fixed in recent updates. The reinstall issue isn't typical - we'd like to look into that. I see you've reached out to support before and we were able to help, so please don't hesitate to contact us again!

DON'T BUY IT. The device is deliberately designed to be unusable on the free plan. No physical mute means it records nonstop unless you open the app, quickly burning the limited free minutes.
